Package com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.suites.optimizer

Class Summary
OptimizerTestSuite All the ARQo tests
TestAPI Test the API, i.e. all the access methods of factories, etc.
TestConfig Some tests to test if the configuration settings behave as expected
TestData Test the probabilistic data build process based on the model provided
TestEnabled The if the BGP optimizer is enabled and enabling/disabling.
TestGraphBuild This test case implements a number of BasicPattern tests, where each test consists of a check whether or not the number of components of a BasicPattern is correct.
TestGraphOptimize This test case allows testing of multiple heuristics to check whether the returned optimized BasicPattern is the same as defined by the test case.
TestHeuristicWeightEdge Test if the estimated weight for an edge given a heuristic corresponds to the expected value specified within the test case.
TestHeuristicWeightNode Test if the estimated weight for a node given a heuristic corresponds to the expected value specified within the test case.
TestIndex Test the probabilistic index build process based on the model provided
TestPrimeNumberGen This is a test for the prime number generator.
TestProbabilityDataModel Probability test case.
TestProbabilityDefaultModel Probability test case.
TestProbabilityIndexModel Probability test case.
TestSamplingDynamic Test suite to test sampling techniques used for the index process of the optimizer
TestSamplingStatic Some static tests for sampling techniques (e.g. isomorph test for sampling of 100%)
TestSuiteGraph  
TestSuiteHeuristic  
TestSuiteProbability The test suite for the probabilistic framework
TestSuiteSampling  
Util The class provides some common functionality required for the test classes, e.g. model loading.
